body:
# Open Spaces!

During the afternoon on both days, we'll have open spaces for people to use to get together as they see fit.

If you want to create something together with the community, this is your opportunity!

You can submit:

- an open source project (be sure to tag open issues or ideas with a label!)
- an idea for something to build together
- mob programming!

(Want to submit a [talk](/submit/talk) or [workshop](/submit/workshop) instead?)

We'll also have an unconference on Friday, where you can submit topics and be matched with small groups.
There will be several pre-seeded topics, but you can also submit your own starting on the Monday before the conference.

<google-form id="1FAIpQLScIpLYoZyExa0NkcmZMhqa7c5-YFEcS4y8mk1p6p9tFNslPhw"></google-form>
